type1.oneliner: Yesterday, a clown held the door open for me. It was such a nice jester!
I asked my French friend if she likes to play video games. She said, "Wii."

type2.setup: How much money does a pirate pay for corn?
Which country's capital has the fastest-growing population?

type1.oneliner: A science teacher tells his class, "Oxygen is a must for breathing and life. It was discovered in 1773." A blonde student responds, "Thank God I was born after 1773! Otherwise I would have died without it."
I'm reading a book about helium. I just can't seem to put it down!

type2.setup: How do astronomers organize a party?
Why can't you trust an atom?
